description: Retrieves the JSON text of the resource-based policy document attached to the AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice resource. A shared resource can be a Pool, Opt-out list, Sender Id, or Phone number.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice resource attached to the resource-based policy.

nested_items.name: ResourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice resource attached to the resource-based policy.

nested_items.name: Policy
nested_items.description: The JSON formatted string that contains the resource-based policy attached to the AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice resource.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the resource-based policy was created, in UNIX epoch time format.
